text.div:
SHR BreastCancerTypeCS CodeSystem

Histologic types of breast cancer. Codes are drawn from ICD-O-3. Codes are presented as local codes due to the lack of a ICD-O-3 terminology server available to the FHIR IG publisher.

name: BreastCancerTypeCS
title: SHR BreastCancerTypeCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Histologic types of breast cancer. Codes are drawn from ICD-O-3. Codes are presented as local codes due to the lack of a ICD-O-3 terminology server available to the FHIR IG publisher.
